entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
